UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: DNA/Lysozyme-binding affinity study of novel peptides from TAT (47-57) and BRCA1 (782-786) in vitro by spectroscopic analysis.
Literature.Reference: Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc. 2019;:
Literature.Author: Lv M, Wang M, Lu K, Peng L, Zhao Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=83.85µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=70.62µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=91.41µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium CMCC 50013(MIC=98.62µg/ml)
